attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want to start this petition to make the law recognise a couple who are not married as a lawfully joined couple and in the unfortunate circumstances that one partner dies then for the remaining partner to be recognised of main next of kin in the case that there is no will left and for the remaining partner be able to do all the things that a husband/wife would be able to do in that case especially where there are children involved

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
